data.about-us#About Us: A Pointer ABC é uma importadora e distribuidora de componentes e acessórios genéricos para equipamentos de rádiocomunicação das principais marcas do mercado. Somos também revenda de rádios Hytera, Caltta, e Intelbras.
data.industries-we-serve#Industries We Serve: Security & Law Enforcement Construction & Engineering Emergency Services Logistics & Transportation We partner with leading manufacturers to bring the best products to our customers.
data.our-mission#Our Mission: We aim to provide high-quality, reliable communication solutions for professionals.
